lines.text: Hey Trish! I'm gonna find your Aaliyah looking ass!
I was afraid prison would make you soft.
People don't get soft in prison.
You ain't the only one that knows some shit.
I can't hit a girl.
Look, I don't know how it is in China, but in America, if a girl is kicking your ass, you do not have to be a gentleman.
For you, killing your son was like running a over a dog in the street. Just something in your way.
Guns don't kill people, people kill people.

[Han Sing starts attacking the gang]
The hell what Mac said,somebody kill that son of a bitch!
So Ahkbar, tell me, is it true what they say about Hong Kong?
What's that?
You know, all you guys do Kung Fu.
Of course. State law.
What's your name?
You think I want you calling me?
I don't have a phone.
Yeah, well dead giveaway. Besides, you drive like shit.

[Han has just sneaked into her room]
Are you out of your mind? What are you doing here?
I missed you.
You missed me? I'm gonna miss you when my father finds out you're here.
[Pointing a gun at Han]
Sorry Romeo, but you gotta die.
He's a lot shorter than I thought.

[laughs]
Oh, Daddy.
He's just a little guy.
Can you break one of those boards with your head?
Sure.
I'd have to see that.
By the way, you drive like shit.

[to Trish, who has just shot him]
Damn, that some cold shit.
Sorry Moron.
Name's Maurice, bitch.
Do I know you?
How you gonna play me like that?
What?
Now you know I work for your pops.
Right, right. What's your name again? Something starts with an M...
Yeah, that's it. That's it.
Moron.
Funny. It's Maurice, all right?
Look, if I wanted Eddie Murphy, I would have gone to the movies!
Hey, brother... AMERICAN FOOTBALL!
Dim Sum good. You call again. Dim Sum all time. Thanks.
Great country. Free cars.
Where is she?
You didn't really think you was gonna get them panties, now did you?
What?
Trish. You didn't really think she was gonna give it up to you, now did you?

[after scoring a touchdown on a video game against co-workers]
How yo momma doin'! How yo momma doin'! Touch-down baby! Take it, take it, take it! Deez nuts in your mouth! I said, put the nuts in your mou-
[boss walks in]
... Why're you all not working? Get to work!

[after Han leaves posing as a delivery boy]
Where the food?
What?
Delivery boy just left, where the hells the take-out food?
Are you hungry baby?
[runs out door, after Han]
Your brother wasn't suited to lead. He didn't have the discipline.
That's why you killed him.
That's why I had to.
Had to? My brother?
That's right.
That... was a mistake!
You killed Colin?
Even fake wars have casualties, Isaak. I guess uh, old collard green couldn't fly, huh?
Let it go Po. This is a hassle we don't need.
I guess I could use a little exercise.

[Pointing the gun]
Don't look at me boy! I'll put your ass on the news tonight!
I'll let fate decide what to do with you. If the police don't get you, the other Chinese families will. Do what you will father, but this time no one will go to prison for you.
I don't care if you're going to confession - it's going to be you, me, and the priest.
I'll have your check.
You think putting your kids through college is going to make all your crooked straight?
Here's the deal, Meatball. You let me go, I let you live.

[Maurice laughs]
He say he's gonna let ME live!
[laughs again]
some you win... and Dim Sum, you lose.
We got a tip this place is going to get hit.
When?
Right now.
[Kai shoots Kung]
I ain't even gonna look, I ain't even gonna look. I'm just gonna play. I can't see, I can't see.
Mr Sing you have my deepest, deepest condolences.
Thank you.
What happened to your son was tragic Mr Sing, very unnecessary. I want you to know i'll be looking into this myself personally.
You will forgive me if I'm not easily moved.

Mr Sing... with all due respect, there is no way in the world that anybody in my camp would be foolish enough to touch your family, any more than anybody in your camp would be stupid enough to touch mine. It just wouldn't happen.
Our business venture will continue.
I'm pleased to hear that, thank you.

[Isaak leaves]
Mac, make sure we got round the clock security for my son and my daughter.
It's all been arranged chief.
You killed Colin?
Even fake wars have casualties, Isaak. I guess uh, old collard green couldn't fly, huh?
